DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study pilot-test culturally-tailored , community-based educational program African-Americans , focus use exercise self-management strategy reduce depressive symptom improve health . This study explore type additional support would encourage depressed African-Americans exercise regularly . The investigator hypothesize participant report great frequency exercise low depression score end program baseline . However , study adequately power test hypothesis - main goal ass feasibility , acceptability satisfaction pilot intervention .
DOC.detailed_description: Several study document effectiveness exercise treatment depression . However , study use supervised exercise medical school university environment include mostly middle-class White population . Little known regard translate finding real world setting minority population . Exercise may particularly beneficial option African-Americans suffer depression . African-Americans face significant disparity depression care . At least part disparity due lack trust healthcare system negative attitude toward antidepressant . Our goal pilot-test culturally-tailored , community-based exercise support program depress African-Americans . We recruit participant screen positive moderate depressive symptom enrol African-American Health Coalition 's Free Exercise Card Program , exercise less 3 time per week . They participate 6-week educational self-care group focus use exercise self-help tool reduce depressive symptom . Participants encourage create action plan regard exercise healthy lifestyle change . Groups also provide culturally-tailored information depression therapy , antidepressant psychotherapy , discuss strategy obtain quality health care .
DOC.criteria: 18 year age AfricanAmerican AfricanAmerican descent Currently participate AfricanAmerican Health Coalition Free ExerciseCard Program Experiencing moderate depressive symptom , indicate score 1020 Depression Scale Patient Health Questionnaire ( PHQ9 . Exercising less three time per week ( minimum 30 minute per session ) past month Actively suicidal If health care provider , AAHC staff member , investigator feel participation program may endanger participant 's health safety . Known mental cognitive impairment Known condition precludes ability feasibly participate support group session .
